Attributes.description: Social organization of Canadian society: relationships between social institutions and social processes (e.g., economics, education, family, law, media, and politics); including issues of ancestry, ethnicity, gender, region, and social class.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of SOCI 100, SOCI 101, SOCI 102.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 18:30, Building: Buchanan, Room: A203
